text:
I'm looking to create a private app to duplicate an entire instance (sequences/workflows/properties/pipelines & stages/etc) - would anyone have any idea on how I could actually approach doing this? I'm a brand new HubSpot partner and trying to recreate my idea to multiple clients...

I'm just curious as to where I can learn how to potentially do this (it would save me a TON of time in recreating my ideas to multiple clients)!
